name: Heroes of the Lance
description:
Heroes of the Lance is a RPG-arcade game developed by U.S. Gold. It came out on 01-01-1988. Strategic Simulations published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Heroes of the Lance is available on PC.
It was scored by Brian Howarth, Iku Mizutani (NES) and Seiji Toda (MSX).
